org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.protocol

Class FsPermissionExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.fs.permission.FsPermission
      • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.protocol.FsPermissionExtension
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class FsPermissionExtension
extends org.apache.hadoop.fs.permission.FsPermission
    HDFS permission subclass used to indicate an ACL is present and/or that the underlying file/dir is encrypted. The ACL/encrypted bits are not visible directly to users of FsPermission serialization. This is done for backwards compatibility in case any existing clients assume the value of FsPermission is in a particular range.
